channel.title: Lecture Notes on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Lecture Notes on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Lecture Notes
item.description: LEC # TOPICS LECTURE NOTES 1 Formulations (PDF) 2 Complexity (PDF) 3 Methods to enhance formulations I (PDF) 4 Methods to enhance formulations II (PDF) 5 Ideal formulations I (PDF) 6 Ideal formulations II (PDF) 7 Ideal formulations III (PDF) 8 Duality theory I (PDF) 9 Duality theory II (PDF) 10 Algorithms for solving relaxations (PDF) 11 Robust discrete optimization (PDF) 12 Lattices I (PDF) 13 Lattices II (PDF) 14 Algebraic geometry I (PDF) 15 Algebraic geometry II (PDF) 16 Geometry (PDF) 17 Cutting plane methods I (PDF) 18 Cutting plane methods II (PDF) 19 Enumerative methods (PDF) 20 Heuristic methods (PDF) 21 Approximation algorithsm I (PDF) 22 Approximation algorithms II (PDF) 23 Approximation algorithms III (PDF) 24 Mixed integer optimization I (PDF) 25 Mixed integer optimization II (PDF)

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec01.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to structure of class, integer optimization, modeling with binary variables and implications.

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec02.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to efficient algorithms and complexity.

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec03.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to polyhedral review, methods to generate valid inequalities and methods to generate facet defining inequalities.

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec04.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to independence set systems and matroids, strength of valid inequalities and nonlinear formulations.

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec05.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to total unimodularity and dual methods.

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec06.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to randomized rounding methods.

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec07.pdf
item.description: This resource contains reference material related to matching polyhedron and lift and project.

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec08.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to duality from lift and project and lagrangean duality.

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec09.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to solution of lagrangean dual and geometry and strength of the lagrangean dual.

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec10.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to ellipsoid method for optimization, ellipsoid method for the feasibility problem and problems with exponentially many constraints.

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec11.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to data uncertainty and robust MIP.

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec12.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to integer points in lattices.

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec13.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to algebraic geometry I.

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec14.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to reduced bases for lattices and simultaneous diophantine approximation.

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec15.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to algebraic geometry II.

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec16.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to a theorem by Edmonds and Giles and totally unimodular matrices.

item.description: This resource contains information related to cutting plane methods I.

item.title: MIT15_083JF09_lec18.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to stable sets and perfect matchings.

item.description: This resource contains information related to enumerative methods.

item.description: This resource contains information related to enumeration and heuristics.
